text: The probability that a randomly selected person is left-handed is greater than 15%.
If you flip a fair coin 3 times, the probability of getting exactly 2 heads is 3/8.
More than 50% of the world's population lives in Asia.
The probability of rolling a sum of 7 with two standard six-sided dice is 1/6.
Antarctica is the largest desert in the world.
The human body has more than 250 bones.
Venus is the hottest planet in our solar system.
The Great Wall of China is visible from the Moon with the naked eye.
